disciplines__description: The platform provides users with the opportunity to bet on a huge number of events in various categories - from sports to exclusive ones created on the basis of current realities. Moreover, each user of the platform can suggest a topic for a bet!
web3-title: Web3.0 technology is now in bets.
advantages__description-1: While using MaranBet you can be sure that all your personal information is absolutely confidential - we do not request any personal data, and all transactions are made in MARAN tokens.
advantages__description-2: MaranBet is protected by an advanced security system that ensures that all your funds remain safe and no one can steal them. Thanks to MetaMask and decentralization, you don't have to worry about your bets and winnings.
advantages__description-3: The platform was created on the basis of blockchain technologies, thanks to which all operations can be controlled. We do not charge any fees for using the platform, as well as for depositing and withdrawing funds.
advantages__description-4: MaranBet offers a huge number of different events to bet on, from classic matches to unique bets on specific people.
advantages__description-5: MaranBet is an international company with no fixed location. This means that you can bet on the platform from any country without the need of using VPN.
advantages__description-6: If you win a large amount of money on bets, then many countries may require you to pay income tax. Forget about it with MaranBet, because cryptocurrency is not taxed!
Most popular questions: You can find answers to the most popular questions in the FAQ section at the bottom of the main page and on the page of your personal account after registration. If you still have questions, you can contact us by clicking on one of the buttons below.
faq__title__1: Are bets accepted in any currency?
faq__title__2: Why do you say that the platform is anonymous?
faq__title__3: Why are bets accepted only in MARAN token?
faq__title__4: Can I suggest an exclusive bet event?
faq__title__6: Is there a minimum and maximum possible bet amount?
faq__content__1: No, on the platform, users can make bets using only MARAN token. You can buy it either on the exchange, or use our SWAP and exchange cryptocurrency for our token. In the future, the number of tokens that we will be accepted for betting will be increased.
faq__content__2: We have created a platform that does not require any information to be provided by you. In order to register, you simply need to connect your crypto wallet via MetaMask. In order to withdraw funds from your account, we also don't ask for any personal data, and the funds will be sent to your crypto wallet, which is also not personalized. All transactions and data on them are stored in the blockchain, which guarantees security and decentralization.
faq__content__3: We decided to create a platform with a native token so that users can earn more from bets. How? You place a bet and at that moment the price of MARAN is one, however, when your coupon "played" and you won, the price of the token may increase several times and, accordingly, you will earn many times more.
faq__content__4: Yes, sure! You can write to us at info@maranbet.com and we will consider your offer.
faq__content__5: Absolutely not! When you deposit assets, no matter how it is carried out (through an exchange or swap), you pay a commission to the blockchain for creating an operation, as soon as the tokens are in your account on the platform, you can start placing bets. We do not charge commission for each bet. When you want to receive winnings and withdraw tokens from the platform, we will also not charge a commission, as well as when depositing.
faq__content__6: Yes. The minimum bet on the platform is currently 200,000 MARAN. There is no maximum bet amount. However, this amount is subject to change in the case when the price of the token rises. In this case, the minimum bet will be reduced.

about-company__banner: MaranBet is the world's first platform created for betting in cryptocurrency
about-company-mission__1: The main mission of the MARAN token is to help people earn money on bets using cryptocurrency
about-company-mission__content: Currently, a large number of people participate in online betting. But there are also people who do not place bets because they do not want to disclose personal information about themselves. To make the betting process more confidential and secure, we have created a MARAN token with which you can place bets on the MaranBet platform. Moreover, by betting in MARAN — you can earn even more when the event you are betting on ends, because the price of MARAN is not fixed and can grow 3 or even more times during the bet!
about-company-advantages__item-descripti: By betting in cryptocurrency, you can earn much more than while playing on conventional platforms, since the token rate may increase by the end of the event, which will lead to an increase in winnings.
Lack of tax control. If you win a large amount of money, then many countries may oblige you to pay income tax. Forget about it with MaranBet, because cryptocurrency is not subject to any taxes!
A large number of sporting events. MaranBet offers its users a huge number of different events that you can bet on — from classic matches to unique bets on certain people.
Lack of state control. Since the cryptocurrency is not subject to control by government agencies, you can be sure that no one will ever know what bet you made and how much you earned.
about-company-participation__item-descri: Buy a MARAN token on the exchange or exchange your cryptocurrency for MARAN tokens through our website or mobile application
Select one or more events from more than 20 categories.
Place a bet and wait for the result! The winnings can become even greater if the token value increases during the event
about-company-plan__title-1: Development of the MaranBet platform. Issue of the native MARAN tokens of the same name. Creation of codes, smart contracts, connecting Web3.0 technology
about-company-plan__title-2: Project presentation. Listing of the MARAN token on the Coinsbit exchange, UNISWAP
about-company-plan__title-3: Development of the mobile application for iOS, Android devices
about-company-plan__title-4: Development and implementation of the lottery functionality
about-company-plan__title-5: Listing of the MARAN token on one of the top-20 exchange, based on the CoinMarketCap rating
about-company-plan__title-6: Implementations of new currencies with which you can place bets on the platform
maran-token-page__description: MARAN is a native token of the MaranBet platform.
maran-token-page__item-description-1: It works according to the ERC-20 standard of the Ethereum blockchain.
maran-token-page__item-description-2: The main application is the opportunity to participate in online betting.
maran-token-page__item-description-3: Invest in the MARAN token as a long-term prospect
maran-token-page__item-description-4: To trade a token on exchanges for additional earnings
